mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RoomList (accountNumber, title, category, memberTotal, period, dueDate) VALUES (#{accountNumber}, #{title}, #{category}, 1, #{period}, #{dueDate});
INSERT INTO PersonList (roomNum, id, role) VALUES (#{roomNum}, #{id}, '팀장');
mapper.update: UPDATE RoomList SET title = #{title}, category = #{category}, memberTotal = #{memberTotal}, period = #{period}, dueDate = #{dueDate} WHERE roomNum = #{roomNum} AND accountNumber = #{accountNumber};
